lom:description.lom:string:
Welcome to the home of the Encyclopedia of Polymer Science and Technology online. This edition - a complete revision and update of the classic 2nd edition, called the Encyclopedia of Polymer Science and Engineering - presents full coverage in all areas of polymer science, covering nanotechnology, imaging and analytical techniques, methods of controlled polymer architecture, biomimetics, and much more. Following the Encyclopedia's original launch, content has been added regularly, and the database now comprises about 300 articles covering all aspects of the field of polymer science.
The encyclopedia's rich content is coupled with a powerful search engine that allows quick, precise searching, coupled with an intuitive interface that makes the database easy to use. Search by keyword or browse the menu of topics to select the subjects that interest you most. An index and chemical thesaurus help you precisely find the information you need, while a dynamic table of contents enables you to browse the ToC and then jump to any article.
Institutional customers may license reference works for access on an annual basis, and select titles offer a one-time fee option. Prices depend on the type of institution, user population, and the collection of Wiley InterScience resources selected. It may also vary based on the size and type of any existing license a Customer holds with Wiley InterScience.

lom:title.lom:string: Encyclopedia of Polymer Science and Technology
